ai_mode_summary:
In Dampier, you can explore the 42 islands of the Dampier Archipelago, discover ancient rock art at [Murujuga National Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cn9p05m9&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQqdYPegQIAhAD) , and visit the famous Red Dog memorial statue . Nearby in Karratha, you can experience the Staircase to the Moon natural phenomenon or visit the [North West Shelf Visitor Centre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11dzt1852v&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQqdYPegQIAhAG).[[1]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/blog/post/5-things-to-do-in-dampier/)[[2]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/dampier/#:~:text=our%20National%20Parks.-,Read%20More,Read%20More)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.com/Tourism-g495053-Dampier_The_Pilbara_Western_Australia-Vacations.html#:~:text=What%20is%20Dampier%20known%20for,Aremvee%20Beach)

Attractions in Dampier

[![](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272303-6179-0139-0000-2a31f826bf6e:0)
Dampier The archipelago offers boating, fishing, snorkeling, and diving opportunities. You may also spot dolphins, turtles, manta rays, and migrating humpback whales from July to September. Several tour operators in town offer boat charters and jet ski tours.](https://www.google.com/search?q=Dampier+Archipelago&kgmid=/m/024vbx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQgPwRegQIBBAB) 

![Image of Murujuga National Park](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSxUKcBUkM2cnNA_sbF3rcEtogweddqJ0yM5Q5RWAipal_g5J7bIoVtlNPYJ36zHAWvX7sL6k_Zj6jAa4-VyD8Ps8pWVl96XTf9n-ogP8CRR9HELxNOb5ynoDGL85MOwrgkd3yPX0b9UbyM=s108-w108-h144-n-k-no)

Murujuga National Park	

4.0(43)

National park

 Home to one of the world's largest collections of ancient Aboriginal rock art, the Burrup Peninsula features thousands of petroglyphs. The park also has walking trails and is culturally significant to the local Indigenous people.

![Image of Red Dog Memorial Statue, Dampier, Western Australia](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSxRQXMgkLAN4xd2flWjtaRXFhYbd_tlIuhEwa_fJia2vjwTlilDPFPMwFCE_2gZjuwU-YMNftCKsV8bXuyYOH7U21NMprxU2Ijg4rCAHaXE2kw2yuYBL9mjDXbrTx7umYdbIly3Tg=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Red Dog Memorial Statue, Dampier, Western Australia	

4.6(386)

Tourist attraction

 Visit the iconic memorial statue of Red Dog, the famous Pilbara wanderer . You can also follow the [Red Dog Trail](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11bw1plsvk&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQqdYPegQIBBAO) around town and enjoy the picnic areas and walkways along the foreshore.

Dampier Port Dampier is Australia's largest tonnage shipping port, handling iron ore and natural gas exports. You can see parts of the port from the outside or take a guided tour for a behind-the-scenes look at the operations.

Deep Gorge Located within [Murujuga National Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cn9p05m9&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQqdYPegQIBBAW) , this site features a significant number of Aboriginal rock carvings.

![Image of North West Shelf Visitors Centre](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSwQy4RUuKt4P1H4VlS7kbMEBsC5MkSE6TlkPKOBNPniP_wPSJRaONuBtLWZOgB-OrOgfN_qp9WhJRPbmxaWs95I1n0niQdIISyHB_W4ej3712jEuy1pww0wVDZZLJlOY0eLfItS5w=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

North West Shelf Visitors Centre	

4.0(46)

Visitor center

 Learn about the massive offshore natural gas project and the area's rich history.[[1]](https://www.karrathaiscalling.com.au/explore/dampier-archipelago/)[[2]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/blog/post/5-things-to-do-in-dampier/)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.com.au/Attractions-g495053-Activities-c42-Dampier_The_Pilbara_Western_Australia.html#:~:text=Robben%20Island%20MuseumRymill%20Park,Kaltbad%20Mineral%20Baths%20Day%20Admission)[[4]](https://www.tripadvisor.com.au/Attractions-g495053-Activities-Dampier_The_Pilbara_Western_Australia.html#:~:text=1.,Day%20Trips)[[5]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/dampier/#:~:text=our%20National%20Parks.-,Read%20More,Read%20More)[[6]](https://www.tripadvisor.ca/Attractions-g495053-Activities-Dampier_The_Pilbara_Western_Australia.html)[[7]](https://dampierseafarers.org/tours/#:~:text=Dampier%20Port%20Tours%20%7C%20Dampier%20-%20Mission,Harvesting%20in%20progress)

Hearson's Cove	

4.7(171)

Beach

 This shallow, beautiful beach is a short drive from Dampier and is a popular spot for a swim or sunset picnic. It is a great location to see the Staircase to the Moon phenomenon between March and October.

[![](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272303-6179-0139-0000-2a31f826bf6e:1)
Karratha Just 20 kilometers from Dampier, Karratha offers additional attractions and a visitor center . references_text: Explore Dampier Archipelago. The Dampier Archipelago in the Pilbara region of WA is a coastal wonderland comprising of 42 islands ...
references_markdown:
In Dampier, you can explore the 42 islands of the Dampier Archipelago, discover ancient rock art at [Murujuga National Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cn9p05m9&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQqdYPegQIAhAD) , and visit the famous Red Dog memorial statue . Nearby in Karratha, you can experience the Staircase to the Moon natural phenomenon or visit the [North West Shelf Visitor Centre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11dzt1852v&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQqdYPegQIAhAG).[[1]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/blog/post/5-things-to-do-in-dampier/)[[2]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/dampier/#:~:text=our%20National%20Parks.-,Read%20More,Read%20More)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.com/Tourism-g495053-Dampier_The_Pilbara_Western_Australia-Vacations.html#:~:text=What%20is%20Dampier%20known%20for,Aremvee%20Beach)

Attractions in Dampier

[![](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272303-6179-0139-0000-2a31f826bf6e:0)
Dampier The archipelago offers boating, fishing, snorkeling, and diving opportunities. You may also spot dolphins, turtles, manta rays, and migrating humpback whales from July to September. Several tour operators in town offer boat charters and jet ski tours.](https://www.google.com/search?q=Dampier+Archipelago&kgmid=/m/024vbx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQgPwRegQIBBAB) 

![Image of Murujuga National Park](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSxUKcBUkM2cnNA_sbF3rcEtogweddqJ0yM5Q5RWAipal_g5J7bIoVtlNPYJ36zHAWvX7sL6k_Zj6jAa4-VyD8Ps8pWVl96XTf9n-ogP8CRR9HELxNOb5ynoDGL85MOwrgkd3yPX0b9UbyM=s108-w108-h144-n-k-no)

Murujuga National Park	

4.0(43)

National park

 Home to one of the world's largest collections of ancient Aboriginal rock art, the Burrup Peninsula features thousands of petroglyphs. The park also has walking trails and is culturally significant to the local Indigenous people.

![Image of Red Dog Memorial Statue, Dampier, Western Australia](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSxRQXMgkLAN4xd2flWjtaRXFhYbd_tlIuhEwa_fJia2vjwTlilDPFPMwFCE_2gZjuwU-YMNftCKsV8bXuyYOH7U21NMprxU2Ijg4rCAHaXE2kw2yuYBL9mjDXbrTx7umYdbIly3Tg=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Red Dog Memorial Statue, Dampier, Western Australia	

4.6(386)

Tourist attraction

 Visit the iconic memorial statue of Red Dog, the famous Pilbara wanderer . You can also follow the [Red Dog Trail](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11bw1plsvk&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQqdYPegQIBBAO) around town and enjoy the picnic areas and walkways along the foreshore.

Dampier Port Dampier is Australia's largest tonnage shipping port, handling iron ore and natural gas exports. You can see parts of the port from the outside or take a guided tour for a behind-the-scenes look at the operations.

Deep Gorge Located within [Murujuga National Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cn9p05m9&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQqdYPegQIBBAW) , this site features a significant number of Aboriginal rock carvings.

![Image of North West Shelf Visitors Centre](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSwQy4RUuKt4P1H4VlS7kbMEBsC5MkSE6TlkPKOBNPniP_wPSJRaONuBtLWZOgB-OrOgfN_qp9WhJRPbmxaWs95I1n0niQdIISyHB_W4ej3712jEuy1pww0wVDZZLJlOY0eLfItS5w=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

North West Shelf Visitors Centre	

4.0(46)

Visitor center

 Learn about the massive offshore natural gas project and the area's rich history.[[1]](https://www.karrathaiscalling.com.au/explore/dampier-archipelago/)[[2]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/blog/post/5-things-to-do-in-dampier/)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.com.au/Attractions-g495053-Activities-c42-Dampier_The_Pilbara_Western_Australia.html#:~:text=Robben%20Island%20MuseumRymill%20Park,Kaltbad%20Mineral%20Baths%20Day%20Admission)[[4]](https://www.tripadvisor.com.au/Attractions-g495053-Activities-Dampier_The_Pilbara_Western_Australia.html#:~:text=1.,Day%20Trips)[[5]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/dampier/#:~:text=our%20National%20Parks.-,Read%20More,Read%20More)[[6]](https://www.tripadvisor.ca/Attractions-g495053-Activities-Dampier_The_Pilbara_Western_Australia.html)[[7]](https://dampierseafarers.org/tours/#:~:text=Dampier%20Port%20Tours%20%7C%20Dampier%20-%20Mission,Harvesting%20in%20progress)

references_markdown:
In Dampier, you can explore the 42 islands of the Dampier Archipelago, discover ancient rock art at [Murujuga National Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cn9p05m9&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQqdYPegQIAhAD) , and visit the famous Red Dog memorial statue . Nearby in Karratha, you can experience the Staircase to the Moon natural phenomenon or visit the [North West Shelf Visitor Centre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11dzt1852v&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQqdYPegQIAhAG).[[1]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/blog/post/5-things-to-do-in-dampier/)[[2]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/dampier/#:~:text=our%20National%20Parks.-,Read%20More,Read%20More)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.com/Tourism-g495053-Dampier_The_Pilbara_Western_Australia-Vacations.html#:~:text=What%20is%20Dampier%20known%20for,Aremvee%20Beach)

Attractions in Dampier

[![](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272303-6179-0139-0000-2a31f826bf6e:0)
Dampier The archipelago offers boating, fishing, snorkeling, and diving opportunities. You may also spot dolphins, turtles, manta rays, and migrating humpback whales from July to September. Several tour operators in town offer boat charters and jet ski tours.](https://www.google.com/search?q=Dampier+Archipelago&kgmid=/m/024vbx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQgPwRegQIBBAB) 

![Image of Murujuga National Park](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSxUKcBUkM2cnNA_sbF3rcEtogweddqJ0yM5Q5RWAipal_g5J7bIoVtlNPYJ36zHAWvX7sL6k_Zj6jAa4-VyD8Ps8pWVl96XTf9n-ogP8CRR9HELxNOb5ynoDGL85MOwrgkd3yPX0b9UbyM=s108-w108-h144-n-k-no)

Murujuga National Park	

4.0(43)

National park

 Home to one of the world's largest collections of ancient Aboriginal rock art, the Burrup Peninsula features thousands of petroglyphs. The park also has walking trails and is culturally significant to the local Indigenous people.

![Image of Red Dog Memorial Statue, Dampier, Western Australia](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSxRQXMgkLAN4xd2flWjtaRXFhYbd_tlIuhEwa_fJia2vjwTlilDPFPMwFCE_2gZjuwU-YMNftCKsV8bXuyYOH7U21NMprxU2Ijg4rCAHaXE2kw2yuYBL9mjDXbrTx7umYdbIly3Tg=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Red Dog Memorial Statue, Dampier, Western Australia	

4.6(386)

Tourist attraction

 Visit the iconic memorial statue of Red Dog, the famous Pilbara wanderer . You can also follow the [Red Dog Trail](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11bw1plsvk&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQqdYPegQIBBAO) around town and enjoy the picnic areas and walkways along the foreshore.

Dampier Port Dampier is Australia's largest tonnage shipping port, handling iron ore and natural gas exports. You can see parts of the port from the outside or take a guided tour for a behind-the-scenes look at the operations.

Deep Gorge Located within [Murujuga National Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cn9p05m9&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQqdYPegQIBBAW) , this site features a significant number of Aboriginal rock carvings.

North West Shelf Visitors Centre	

4.0(46)

Visitor center

In Dampier, you can explore the 42 islands of the Dampier Archipelago, discover ancient rock art at [Murujuga National Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cn9p05m9&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQqdYPegQIAhAD) , and visit the famous Red Dog memorial statue . Nearby in Karratha, you can experience the Staircase to the Moon natural phenomenon or visit the [North West Shelf Visitor Centre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11dzt1852v&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQqdYPegQIAhAG).[[1]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/blog/post/5-things-to-do-in-dampier/)[[2]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/dampier/#:~:text=our%20National%20Parks.-,Read%20More,Read%20More)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.com/Tourism-g495053-Dampier_The_Pilbara_Western_Australia-Vacations.html#:~:text=What%20is%20Dampier%20known%20for,Aremvee%20Beach)

Attractions in Dampier

[![](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272303-6179-0139-0000-2a31f826bf6e:0)
Dampier The archipelago offers boating, fishing, snorkeling, and diving opportunities. You may also spot dolphins, turtles, manta rays, and migrating humpback whales from July to September. Several tour operators in town offer boat charters and jet ski tours.](https://www.google.com/search?q=Dampier+Archipelago&kgmid=/m/024vbx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQgPwRegQIBBAB)

Murujuga National Park	

4.0(43)

National park

 Home to one of the world's largest collections of ancient Aboriginal rock art, the Burrup Peninsula features thousands of petroglyphs. The park also has walking trails and is culturally significant to the local Indigenous people.

![Image of Red Dog Memorial Statue, Dampier, Western Australia](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSxRQXMgkLAN4xd2flWjtaRXFhYbd_tlIuhEwa_fJia2vjwTlilDPFPMwFCE_2gZjuwU-YMNftCKsV8bXuyYOH7U21NMprxU2Ijg4rCAHaXE2kw2yuYBL9mjDXbrTx7umYdbIly3Tg=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Red Dog Memorial Statue, Dampier, Western Australia	

4.6(386)

Tourist attraction

 Visit the iconic memorial statue of Red Dog, the famous Pilbara wanderer . You can also follow the [Red Dog Trail](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11bw1plsvk&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQqdYPegQIBBAO) around town and enjoy the picnic areas and walkways along the foreshore.

Dampier Port Dampier is Australia's largest tonnage shipping port, handling iron ore and natural gas exports. You can see parts of the port from the outside or take a guided tour for a behind-the-scenes look at the operations.

Deep Gorge Located within [Murujuga National Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cn9p05m9&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQqdYPegQIBBAW) , this site features a significant number of Aboriginal rock carvings.

 Learn about the massive offshore natural gas project and the area's rich history.[[1]](https://www.karrathaiscalling.com.au/explore/dampier-archipelago/)[[2]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/blog/post/5-things-to-do-in-dampier/)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.com.au/Attractions-g495053-Activities-c42-Dampier_The_Pilbara_Western_Australia.html#:~:text=Robben%20Island%20MuseumRymill%20Park,Kaltbad%20Mineral%20Baths%20Day%20Admission)[[4]](https://www.tripadvisor.com.au/Attractions-g495053-Activities-Dampier_The_Pilbara_Western_Australia.html#:~:text=1.,Day%20Trips)[[5]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/explore/pilbara/dampier/#:~:text=our%20National%20Parks.-,Read%20More,Read%20More)[[6]](https://www.tripadvisor.ca/Attractions-g495053-Activities-Dampier_The_Pilbara_Western_Australia.html)[[7]](https://dampierseafarers.org/tours/#:~:text=Dampier%20Port%20Tours%20%7C%20Dampier%20-%20Mission,Harvesting%20in%20progress)

Things to do near Dampier

![Image of Hearson's Cove](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSzPlKZ_CMRn9vTd950lenL7V6vIxT_dWDKPfWVWh6aoe6RQpHbbNBmLruk30iyxFQEr20rAiTCf1wDcTvV8YYYi0_mqzam-gXbhTMmDcEuqYmsCsGBEcaMptaIrolZkYlB16BfkHQ=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Hearson's Cove	

4.7(171)

Beach

 This shallow, beautiful beach is a short drive from Dampier and is a popular spot for a swim or sunset picnic. It is a great location to see the Staircase to the Moon phenomenon between March and October.

[![](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272303-6179-0139-0000-2a31f826bf6e:1)
Karratha Just 20 kilometers from Dampier, Karratha offers additional attractions and a visitor center . You can pick up maps for the [Yaburara Heritage Trail](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1tmwkn55&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQqdYPegQICBAJ) here.](https://www.google.com/search?q=Karratha&kgmid=/m/052dgn&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi6mL-1nZORAxW7ODQIHYGMKkwQgPwRegQICBAG) 

Cossack This historic ghost town features restored bluestone buildings and offers a glimpse into the region's past.

![Image of Millstream Chichester National Park](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSwMq6szukZNbfjuyl7xT1Tndm44Tg-vp5-Eyn_DsovmHF3kxYhom8kThZtp9LegOrutt6twPe1DIeC0cvj3-qgY3I5r386okL6y82hemSiXdxZ2-fT7JBa4_NYh_PV8r9LkCVyp=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)

Millstream Chichester National Park	

4.2(152)

National park

 This park offers walks and camping opportunities and is situated inland from Dampier.[[1]](https://www.australiasnorthwest.com/blog/post/5-things-to-do-in-dampier/)[[2]](https://destinationpilbara.com.au/features/attractions#:~:text=Staircase%20to%20the%20Moon,Read%20More)[[3]](https://www.karrathaiscalling.com.au/explore/dampier/)[[4]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/visitorcentre/karratha-tourism-and-visitor-centre/56b268b7d5f1565045dabe30#:~:text=Opening%20Times,diving%20up%20there%20is%20epic!)[[5]](https://www.karrathaiscalling.com.au/explore/dampier-archipelago/)

references_text: Dream road trips for real life adventures. Perth Waterfall Day Trip A Day in Perth Perth Wildflower Trail Rottnest by Ferry and Bi...
references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272302-6179-0139-0000-bfea3c1640b3:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegQIKBAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI9gEQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI7AEQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxQUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxgUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI1wUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI2AUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjwUQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIuwUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIpwUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkAUQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjgUQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkwUQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkgUQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkQUQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

[![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQyn8AsXDOj7TAkkAmE501Cre85_iaORiIwQy_8a7Fx-ygiFTQ_2Dmto5Y&s=10)
0:17](https://www.instagram.com/reel/DPfhDYQgdd6/) [Explore Perth's Best Experiences: 5 Must-Do Attractions![](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272302-6179-0139-0000-bfea3c1640b3:5)

references_text: 18 of the best things to do in Perth * Picnic in Kings Park and Botanic Garden. Kings Park. ... * Ascend the Swan Bell Tower. Sun...
references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272302-6179-0139-0000-bfea3c1640b3:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegQIKBAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI9gEQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI7AEQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxQUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxgUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI1wUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI2AUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjwUQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIuwUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIpwUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkAUQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjgUQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkwUQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkgUQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkQUQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

references_text: 21 Jan 2025 —  The 19 best things to do in and around Perth * See quokkas on Rottnest Island. The cute and furry cherub-faced marsupi...
references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272302-6179-0139-0000-bfea3c1640b3:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegQIKBAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI9gEQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI7AEQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxQUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxgUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI1wUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI2AUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjwUQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIuwUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIpwUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkAUQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjgUQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkwUQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkgUQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkQUQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

[![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQyn8AsXDOj7TAkkAmE501Cre85_iaORiIwQy_8a7Fx-ygiFTQ_2Dmto5Y&s=10)

references_text: Other Top Attractions around Perth * Fremantle Prison. 4.6. (4,382) 15 km away. Fremantle. Historic Sites. * SeaLink Rottnest Isl...
references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272302-6179-0139-0000-bfea3c1640b3:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegQIKBAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI9gEQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI7AEQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxQUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxgUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI1wUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI2AUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjwUQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIuwUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIpwUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkAUQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjgUQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkwUQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkgUQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkQUQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

[![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQyn8AsXDOj7TAkkAmE501Cre85_iaORiIwQy_8a7Fx-ygiFTQ_2Dmto5Y&s=10)

![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272302-6179-0139-0000-bfea3c1640b3:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegQIKBAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI9gEQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI7AEQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxQUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxgUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI1wUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI2AUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjwUQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIuwUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIpwUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkAUQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjgUQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkwUQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkgUQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkQUQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

references_text: >>> Get your tickets here. Optus Stadium. Optus Stadium Behind the scenes' guided tour is something for all those sports fans youn...
references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272302-6179-0139-0000-bfea3c1640b3:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegQIKBAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI9gEQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI7AEQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxQUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxgUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI1wUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI2AUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjwUQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIuwUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIpwUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkAUQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjgUQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkwUQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkgUQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkQUQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

[![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQyn8AsXDOj7TAkkAmE501Cre85_iaORiIwQy_8a7Fx-ygiFTQ_2Dmto5Y&s=10)

references_text: Top things to do in Perth * Swim at Perth's beaches. This stretch of coastline offers white sand beaches, calm waters, snorkellin...
references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272302-6179-0139-0000-bfea3c1640b3:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegQIKBAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI9gEQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI7AEQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxQUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxgUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI1wUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI2AUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjwUQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIuwUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIpwUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkAUQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjgUQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkwUQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkgUQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkQUQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

references_text: 7 Oct 2024 —  Overview of the Ultimate 5 day Perth Itinerary * Day 1 – Explore the city, Kings Park and Botanic Gardens. * Day 2 – Di...
references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272302-6179-0139-0000-bfea3c1640b3:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegQIKBAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI9gEQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI7AEQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxQUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxgUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI1wUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI2AUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjwUQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIuwUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIpwUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkAUQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjgUQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkwUQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkgUQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkQUQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

[![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQyn8AsXDOj7TAkkAmE501Cre85_iaORiIwQy_8a7Fx-ygiFTQ_2Dmto5Y&s=10)
