references_text: Rottnest Island: Paradise for Lovers of Beaches A short ferry ride from Perth takes you to a paradise for beach lovers – Rottnest ...
references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272302-6179-0139-0000-bfea3c1640b3:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegQIKBAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI9gEQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI7AEQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxQUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxgUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI1wUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI2AUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjwUQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIuwUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIpwUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkAUQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjgUQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkwUQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkgUQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkQUQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

[![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQyn8AsXDOj7TAkkAmE501Cre85_iaORiIwQy_8a7Fx-ygiFTQ_2Dmto5Y&s=10)

references_text: Over at Western Australia, wildlife, waves, and wine take centre stage in Perth during summer. Consider taking a ferry to Rottnest...
references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272302-6179-0139-0000-bfea3c1640b3:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegQIKBAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI9gEQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI7AEQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxQUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxgUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI1wUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI2AUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjwUQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIuwUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIpwUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkAUQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjgUQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkwUQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkgUQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkQUQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

references_text: 5 July 2024 — If you're looking for what to do in Perth, a day trip to the Pinnacles is a must. Located in Nambung National Park, Wes...
references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272302-6179-0139-0000-bfea3c1640b3:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegQIKBAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI9gEQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI7AEQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxQUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxgUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI1wUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI2AUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjwUQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIuwUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIpwUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkAUQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjgUQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkwUQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkgUQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkQUQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

[![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQyn8AsXDOj7TAkkAmE501Cre85_iaORiIwQy_8a7Fx-ygiFTQ_2Dmto5Y&s=10)

references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272302-6179-0139-0000-bfea3c1640b3:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegQIKBAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI9gEQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI7AEQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxQUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxgUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI1wUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI2AUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjwUQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIuwUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIpwUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkAUQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjgUQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkwUQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkgUQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkQUQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

keyword: things to do in perth australia
references_text: 2 June 2025 — See koalas, kangaroos and exotic wildlife native to the Australian continent.
references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272302-6179-0139-0000-bfea3c1640b3:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegQIKBAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI9gEQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI7AEQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxQUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxgUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI1wUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI2AUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjwUQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIuwUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIpwUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkAUQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjgUQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkwUQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkgUQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkQUQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

references_text: 13 Jan 2025 — Ready for a break from Circular Quay's sights? Head to the waterfront bars and pubs. They're perfect for relaxing, enjo...
references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272302-6179-0139-0000-bfea3c1640b3:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegQIKBAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI9gEQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI7AEQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxQUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxgUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI1wUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI2AUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjwUQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIuwUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIpwUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkAUQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjgUQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkwUQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkgUQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkQUQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

[![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQyn8AsXDOj7TAkkAmE501Cre85_iaORiIwQy_8a7Fx-ygiFTQ_2Dmto5Y&s=10)

references_text: 16 Dec 2014 — Just south of Perth and 10 minutes from Fremantle is Western Australia's most iconic amusement park. A one-stop enterta...
references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272302-6179-0139-0000-bfea3c1640b3:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegQIKBAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI9gEQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI7AEQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxQUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxgUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI1wUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI2AUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjwUQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIuwUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIpwUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkAUQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjgUQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkwUQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkgUQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkQUQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

references_text: Meet the local wildlife in Perth Across in the west, Perth offers visitors the opportunity to encounter amazing wildlife. You can ...
references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272302-6179-0139-0000-bfea3c1640b3:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegQIKBAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI9gEQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI7AEQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxQUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxgUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI1wUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI2AUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjwUQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIuwUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIpwUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkAUQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjgUQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkwUQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkgUQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkQUQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

[![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQyn8AsXDOj7TAkkAmE501Cre85_iaORiIwQy_8a7Fx-ygiFTQ_2Dmto5Y&s=10)

references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272302-6179-0139-0000-bfea3c1640b3:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegQIKBAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI9gEQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI7AEQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxQUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxgUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI1wUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI2AUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjwUQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIuwUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIpwUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkAUQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjgUQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkwUQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkgUQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkQUQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

[![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQyn8AsXDOj7TAkkAmE501Cre85_iaORiIwQy_8a7Fx-ygiFTQ_2Dmto5Y&s=10)

references_markdown:
![THE 15 BEST Things to Do in Perth (2025) - Must-See Attractions](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11272302-6179-0139-0000-bfea3c1640b3:4)
In Perth, you can `visit iconic landmarks like Kings Park, Rottnest Island, and the Swan Bell Tower, explore cultural sites such as Fremantle Prison and the Western Australian Museum, and enjoy the city's beautiful beaches like Cottesloe and Scarborough`.Other activities include wine tasting in the Swan Valley, wildlife spotting on a day trip, and experiencing the Perth Mint.  
[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)[[4]](https://westernaustraliantravel.com/things-to-do-in-perth-in-winter/)[[5]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[6]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)

Outdoors and nature

- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegQIKBAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI9gEQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI7AEQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxQUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxgUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI1wUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI2AUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.

Arts and culture

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Fremantle&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjwUQAQ):** Explore the historic streets and visit the Fremantle Prison or the Fremantle Markets.
- **Museums:** Visit the Museum Boola Bardip, [Art Gallery of Western Australia](https://artgallery.wa.gov.au/) , WA Maritime Museum, or the WA Shipwrecks Museum.
- **[Perth Mint](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Mint&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIuwUQAQ):** See the world's largest gold coin and learn about the mint's history.
- **[The Bell Tower](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Bell+Tower&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIpwUQAQ):** Go up the tower to see the city from a unique perspective.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Elizabeth+Quay&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkAUQAQ):** Explore the waterfront precinct with its restaurants, bars, and the unique Spanda sculpture.

Family-friendly

- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCzJIOONihp14LMRP44RCUb2aZb693MqB6n7QQPQkj&s=0)
**[Perth Zoo](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Perth+Zoo&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIjgUQAQ):** Spend a day exploring the zoo and its diverse animal collection.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6AMeWXpk0BpqWBHZUHTjLG5rSjD5FUHdDKQoNPVTkRRVa_GgeSh6S&s=0)
**[Caversham Wildlife Park](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Caversham+Wildlife+Park&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIlAUQAQ):** Get up close with native Australian animals like kangaroos and koalas.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRwUGm92en1ZY_GQSzdNXqRKkhT_SAQtE6Ab_RUdGM&s=0)
**[Scitech](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Scitech&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkwUQAQ):** A hands-on science museum and planetarium that's great for kids.
- ![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIvalpG7Md4dKbIlODwmOIlcpNVKZL5zCGWOpbohD0soAOl0N74-8v&s=0)
**[Adventure World](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Adventure+World&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkgUQAQ):** An amusement park with rides and attractions for all ages.
- **[Optus Stadium](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Optus+Stadium&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIkQUQAQ):** Take a tour of the stadium or go on the roof climb for panoramic views.

[![](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQyn8AsXDOj7TAkkAmE501Cre85_iaORiIwQy_8a7Fx-ygiFTQ_2Dmto5Y&s=10)

keyword: things to do in perth australia
references_text: 18 of the best things to do in Perth * Picnic in Kings Park and Botanic Garden. Kings Park. ... * Ascend the Swan Bell Tower. Sun...
references_markdown:
- **[Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Kings+Park+and+Botanic+Garden&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegQIKBAB):** Enjoy a picnic, walk through the Western Australian Botanic Garden, and take in city views.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI9gEQAQ):** See the famous quokkas, relax on the beaches, or cycle around the island.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[3]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[4]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)[[5]](https://seduniatravel.com/pdf-preview/?post_id=48845#:~:text=The%20roundtrip%20ferry%20ride%20is%20included%20and,hop-on-hop-off%20bus%20for%20a%20more%20relaxed%20option.)
- **Beaches:** Visit Cottesloe Beach for a classic experience or go to Scarborough Beach for a vibrant atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.lonelyplanet.com/articles/things-to-do-in-perth)[[2]](https://www.tripadvisor.co.nz/Attractions-g255103-Activities-Perth_Greater_Perth_Western_Australia.html)
- **[Swan Valley](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Swan+Valley&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI7AEQAQ):** Go wine tasting at the many vineyards and breweries in this region, which is close to the city.[[1]](https://www.thetimes.com/travel/destinations/australasia-travel/australia/perth/best-things-to-do-perth-93j0fq8hr)[[2]](https://www.australia.com/en-gb/places/perth-and-surrounds/guide-to-perth.html)[[3]](https://aidenandmaddy.com/perth-itinerary/)
- **Day trips:** 
	- **[The Pinnacles](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=The+Pinnacles&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxQUQAQ):** Take a day trip to see the unique limestone formations in Nambung National Park.
	- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Rottnest+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUIxgUQAQ):** Take a ferry for a day trip to see the quokkas and beaches.
	- **[Penguin Island](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Penguin+Island&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI1wUQAQ):** See little penguins in their natural habitat.
	- **[Whale watching](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=3f40fa7dc3b23699&hl=en&gl=AU&q=Whale+watching&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj28OGznZORAxX2mYkEHZPyChEQxccNegUI2AUQAQ):** Go on a whale watching tour between May and November to see humpback whales.
