ai_mode_summary:
To enjoy Perth, `visit its inner-city parks, explore its coastal areas, and venture to nearby islands` . Notable activities include enjoying nature and views at [Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIAhAD) , discovering the port city of [Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIAhAF) , and seeing quokkas and beaches on [Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIAhAH).[[1]](https://www.rottnestisland.com/visit/guides-tips/an-unforgettable-group-getaway-to-rottnest-island)[[2]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)

City and nature experiences

**[Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIBBAC) and Botanic Garden**   
One of the world's largest inner-city parks, [Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIBBAF) offers panoramic views of the Swan River and Perth's skyline.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

- **What to do:** Explore the Western Australian Botanic Garden , walk through the bushland, and visit the [State War Memorial](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1w604csr&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIBRAD).
- **Cost:** Free to enter.
- **Accessibility:** The park is wheelchair accessible, with ACROD parking available.[[1]](https://www.bgpa.wa.gov.au/kings-park#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20is%20both%20one,Kings%20Park%20Bushland)[[2]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)[[3]](https://www.visitperth.com/see-and-do/parks-gardens-and-reserves/Venues/kings-park#:~:text=In%20the%20very%20heart%20of,more%20in%20the%20video%20below%29.)[[4]](https://melbournecitycard.com/pricing/#:~:text=All%20you%20Need%20:%20All%20the%20listed,to%20Unlimited%20Attractions%20suitable%20for%20all%20ages!)

- ![](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSzgkO8rr-GqWMBInTy_CNAVQh4NHq4hMLjQRUVd6iI2YkmvCLdY8ASh8LfDQ7q5u_lZ6H_Z2779_xh7R_31aFuCVM3AEZfG-rfvVZVCQU_8rRjqkMwwQgo7Howzii4IKG98ODLrNA=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)
Kings Park and Botanic Garden 4.8 (27.5K)Open · National park Fraser Ave
- ![](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSxYITJAvSof25rqx820ylXGIns7_9JZurc4C6ON24NKuDP0IgbUnMkGrPt3z9HBHYfsYDhVGD48Vld7WVFJuFxF94eMn0zH8tzxggu3NVaws0J6PqeKJGFx_Ww46RlnjJsXNyTcBg=w231-h308-n-k-no)
Fremantle City in Western Australia
- ![](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSz-IJM_oa98rGhLlKIOrphPOOUe8YbUEUV0vWxbpuVC-oQY23bd1YKi-SIAaPTTijeqEx0macm1wQejiM3UsVt2fFGXo75n111bhoF-aat_kip8WEfftMLb6iuGSvbcgpT0IU4=w246-h308-n-k-no)
Rottnest Island Island in Western Australia
- ![](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/gps-cs-s/AG0ilSzEVo8g9-GujdurC1jMQfRFkgN-aaTQwcoxLT_kPv-neiyxkiB0smjGfV82W2R9mGJF8xPucduAitBwvddvKjqn0GPgDeqrg-SkcCcQWwcBsCXNqq0aZ3fCVbDFrJU_xrZv_wBM=s192-w192-h144-n-k-no)
State War Memorial 4.8 (1.6K)Open · War memorial Fraser Ave

**Swan River**   
The Swan River is a centerpiece for recreation, with scenic cruises and walking paths along its banks.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

- **What to do:** Take a cruise, walk or cycle along the paths, or attend an event on the river.
- **Cultural Walking Tours:** Go Cultural Aboriginal Tours offers guided tours of Elizabeth Quay to learn about the area's rich history.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/christmas-dinner-cruise/4160/)[[2]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1963684017758)[[3]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[4]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

**[Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIChAC)**   
This interactive science museum features hands-on exhibits, a planetarium, and puppet shows, making it a great family-friendly option.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[2]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/warrior-world%3A-family-sundays/68538ca9a86647e01658c913)[[3]](https://www.expedia.co.in/SCITECH-Discovery-Centre-West-Perth.d6061189.Attraction#:~:text=A%20much-loved%20destination%20for%20families%20for%20over,exhibits%20on%20science%2C%20technology%2C%20engineering%20and%20mathematics.)[[4]](https://www.kayak.co.uk/news/family-holidays-in-australia/#:~:text=Perth%20also%20has%20a%20fantastic%20science%20museum%2C,around%20the%20Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Gardens.)[[5]](https://theabroadguide.com/scitech-discovery-centre-all-day-entry-ticket/#:~:text=Scitech%20Discovery%20Centre%20All%20Day%20Entry%20Ticket,Station%2C%20making%20access%20easy%20via%20public%20transport.)

- **What to do:** Experience the immersive planetarium or explore the various science exhibits. [Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQICxAC) also hosts adults-only "Planetarium Experience" events.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)

Coastal adventures

**[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDRAC)**   
A short ferry ride from [Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDRAE) , this island is known for its beautiful beaches, bays, and unique wildlife.[[1]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)

- **Getting there:** Ferries are available from [Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDhAC) and Perth City.
- **What to do:** Rent a bike to explore the island, take a bus tour, or try snorkeling, swimming, and fishing in the pristine waters.
- **Quokkas:** Don't miss the chance to see the island's famous and adorable quokkas.[[1]](https://www.rottnestisland.com/visit/guides-tips/an-unforgettable-group-getaway-to-rottnest-island)[[2]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)

This port city is located at the mouth of the Swan River and offers a vibrant mix of history, arts, and markets.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://events.tourism.australia.com/ate21/familiarisation-program#:~:text=Venture%20to%20the%20port%20city%20of%20Fremantle,get%20a%20selfie%20with%20the%20world-famous%20quokka.)[[3]](https://duniyasafari.com/destination/australia#:~:text=From%20Perth%20Rottnest%20Island:%20Famous%20for%20its,is%20perfect%20for%20a%20cultural%20day%20out.)

- **What to do:** Visit the [Fremantle Arts Centre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0d4yqf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIEBAC) to see exhibitions and markets, such as the "Bazaar Makers Market," featuring local artisans.

To enjoy Perth, `visit its inner-city parks, explore its coastal areas, and venture to nearby islands` . Notable activities include enjoying nature and views at [Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIAhAD) , discovering the port city of [Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIAhAF) , and seeing quokkas and beaches on [Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIAhAH).[[1]](https://www.rottnestisland.com/visit/guides-tips/an-unforgettable-group-getaway-to-rottnest-island)[[2]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)

City and nature experiences

**[Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIBBAC) and Botanic Garden**   
One of the world's largest inner-city parks, [Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIBBAF) offers panoramic views of the Swan River and Perth's skyline.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

- **What to do:** Explore the Western Australian Botanic Garden , walk through the bushland, and visit the [State War Memorial](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1w604csr&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIBRAD).
- **Cost:** Free to enter.
- **Accessibility:** The park is wheelchair accessible, with ACROD parking available.[[1]](https://www.bgpa.wa.gov.au/kings-park#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20is%20both%20one,Kings%20Park%20Bushland)[[2]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)[[3]](https://www.visitperth.com/see-and-do/parks-gardens-and-reserves/Venues/kings-park#:~:text=In%20the%20very%20heart%20of,more%20in%20the%20video%20below%29.)[[4]](https://melbournecitycard.com/pricing/#:~:text=All%20you%20Need%20:%20All%20the%20listed,to%20Unlimited%20Attractions%20suitable%20for%20all%20ages!)

This interactive science museum features hands-on exhibits, a planetarium, and puppet shows, making it a great family-friendly option.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[2]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/warrior-world%3A-family-sundays/68538ca9a86647e01658c913)[[3]](https://www.expedia.co.in/SCITECH-Discovery-Centre-West-Perth.d6061189.Attraction#:~:text=A%20much-loved%20destination%20for%20families%20for%20over,exhibits%20on%20science%2C%20technology%2C%20engineering%20and%20mathematics.)[[4]](https://www.kayak.co.uk/news/family-holidays-in-australia/#:~:text=Perth%20also%20has%20a%20fantastic%20science%20museum%2C,around%20the%20Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Gardens.)[[5]](https://theabroadguide.com/scitech-discovery-centre-all-day-entry-ticket/#:~:text=Scitech%20Discovery%20Centre%20All%20Day%20Entry%20Ticket,Station%2C%20making%20access%20easy%20via%20public%20transport.)

[Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQICxAC) also hosts adults-only "Planetarium Experience" events.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)

Coastal adventures

**[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDRAC)**

To enjoy Perth, `visit its inner-city parks, explore its coastal areas, and venture to nearby islands` . Notable activities include enjoying nature and views at [Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIAhAD) , discovering the port city of [Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIAhAF) , and seeing quokkas and beaches on [Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIAhAH).[[1]](https://www.rottnestisland.com/visit/guides-tips/an-unforgettable-group-getaway-to-rottnest-island)[[2]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)

One of the world's largest inner-city parks, [Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIBBAF) offers panoramic views of the Swan River and Perth's skyline.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

- **Cost:** Free to enter.
- **Accessibility:** The park is wheelchair accessible, with ACROD parking available.[[1]](https://www.bgpa.wa.gov.au/kings-park#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20is%20both%20one,Kings%20Park%20Bushland)[[2]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)[[3]](https://www.visitperth.com/see-and-do/parks-gardens-and-reserves/Venues/kings-park#:~:text=In%20the%20very%20heart%20of,more%20in%20the%20video%20below%29.)[[4]](https://melbournecitycard.com/pricing/#:~:text=All%20you%20Need%20:%20All%20the%20listed,to%20Unlimited%20Attractions%20suitable%20for%20all%20ages!)

- **Cultural Walking Tours:** Go Cultural Aboriginal Tours offers guided tours of Elizabeth Quay to learn about the area's rich history.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/christmas-dinner-cruise/4160/)[[2]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1963684017758)[[3]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[4]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

**[Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIChAC)**   
This interactive science museum features hands-on exhibits, a planetarium, and puppet shows, making it a great family-friendly option.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[2]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/warrior-world%3A-family-sundays/68538ca9a86647e01658c913)[[3]](https://www.expedia.co.in/SCITECH-Discovery-Centre-West-Perth.d6061189.Attraction#:~:text=A%20much-loved%20destination%20for%20families%20for%20over,exhibits%20on%20science%2C%20technology%2C%20engineering%20and%20mathematics.)[[4]](https://www.kayak.co.uk/news/family-holidays-in-australia/#:~:text=Perth%20also%20has%20a%20fantastic%20science%20museum%2C,around%20the%20Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Gardens.)[[5]](https://theabroadguide.com/scitech-discovery-centre-all-day-entry-ticket/#:~:text=Scitech%20Discovery%20Centre%20All%20Day%20Entry%20Ticket,Station%2C%20making%20access%20easy%20via%20public%20transport.)

- **What to do:** Experience the immersive planetarium or explore the various science exhibits. [Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQICxAC) also hosts adults-only "Planetarium Experience" events.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)

Coastal adventures

**[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDRAC)**   
A short ferry ride from [Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDRAE) , this island is known for its beautiful beaches, bays, and unique wildlife.[[1]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)

- **Getting there:** Ferries are available from [Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDhAC) and Perth City.

The Swan River is a centerpiece for recreation, with scenic cruises and walking paths along its banks.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

- **What to do:** Take a cruise, walk or cycle along the paths, or attend an event on the river.
- **Cultural Walking Tours:** Go Cultural Aboriginal Tours offers guided tours of Elizabeth Quay to learn about the area's rich history.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/christmas-dinner-cruise/4160/)[[2]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1963684017758)[[3]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[4]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

**[Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIChAC)**   
This interactive science museum features hands-on exhibits, a planetarium, and puppet shows, making it a great family-friendly option.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[2]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/warrior-world%3A-family-sundays/68538ca9a86647e01658c913)[[3]](https://www.expedia.co.in/SCITECH-Discovery-Centre-West-Perth.d6061189.Attraction#:~:text=A%20much-loved%20destination%20for%20families%20for%20over,exhibits%20on%20science%2C%20technology%2C%20engineering%20and%20mathematics.)[[4]](https://www.kayak.co.uk/news/family-holidays-in-australia/#:~:text=Perth%20also%20has%20a%20fantastic%20science%20museum%2C,around%20the%20Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Gardens.)[[5]](https://theabroadguide.com/scitech-discovery-centre-all-day-entry-ticket/#:~:text=Scitech%20Discovery%20Centre%20All%20Day%20Entry%20Ticket,Station%2C%20making%20access%20easy%20via%20public%20transport.)

- **What to do:** Experience the immersive planetarium or explore the various science exhibits. [Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQICxAC) also hosts adults-only "Planetarium Experience" events.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)

Coastal adventures

**[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDRAC)**   
A short ferry ride from [Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDRAE) , this island is known for its beautiful beaches, bays, and unique wildlife.[[1]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)

- **Getting there:** Ferries are available from [Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDhAC) and Perth City.
- **What to do:** Rent a bike to explore the island, take a bus tour, or try snorkeling, swimming, and fishing in the pristine waters.

This port city is located at the mouth of the Swan River and offers a vibrant mix of history, arts, and markets.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://events.tourism.australia.com/ate21/familiarisation-program#:~:text=Venture%20to%20the%20port%20city%20of%20Fremantle,get%20a%20selfie%20with%20the%20world-famous%20quokka.)[[3]](https://duniyasafari.com/destination/australia#:~:text=From%20Perth%20Rottnest%20Island:%20Famous%20for%20its,is%20perfect%20for%20a%20cultural%20day%20out.)

Notable activities include enjoying nature and views at [Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIAhAD) , discovering the port city of [Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIAhAF) , and seeing quokkas and beaches on [Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIAhAH).[[1]](https://www.rottnestisland.com/visit/guides-tips/an-unforgettable-group-getaway-to-rottnest-island)[[2]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)

One of the world's largest inner-city parks, [Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIBBAF) offers panoramic views of the Swan River and Perth's skyline.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

- **What to do:** Explore the Western Australian Botanic Garden , walk through the bushland, and visit the [State War Memorial](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1w604csr&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIBRAD).
- **Cost:** Free to enter.

The Swan River is a centerpiece for recreation, with scenic cruises and walking paths along its banks.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

- **What to do:** Take a cruise, walk or cycle along the paths, or attend an event on the river.
- **Cultural Walking Tours:** Go Cultural Aboriginal Tours offers guided tours of Elizabeth Quay to learn about the area's rich history.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/christmas-dinner-cruise/4160/)[[2]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1963684017758)[[3]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[4]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

**[Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIChAC)**   
This interactive science museum features hands-on exhibits, a planetarium, and puppet shows, making it a great family-friendly option.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[2]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/warrior-world%3A-family-sundays/68538ca9a86647e01658c913)[[3]](https://www.expedia.co.in/SCITECH-Discovery-Centre-West-Perth.d6061189.Attraction#:~:text=A%20much-loved%20destination%20for%20families%20for%20over,exhibits%20on%20science%2C%20technology%2C%20engineering%20and%20mathematics.)[[4]](https://www.kayak.co.uk/news/family-holidays-in-australia/#:~:text=Perth%20also%20has%20a%20fantastic%20science%20museum%2C,around%20the%20Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Gardens.)[[5]](https://theabroadguide.com/scitech-discovery-centre-all-day-entry-ticket/#:~:text=Scitech%20Discovery%20Centre%20All%20Day%20Entry%20Ticket,Station%2C%20making%20access%20easy%20via%20public%20transport.)

- **What to do:** Experience the immersive planetarium or explore the various science exhibits. [Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQICxAC) also hosts adults-only "Planetarium Experience" events.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)

Coastal adventures

**[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDRAC)**   
A short ferry ride from [Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDRAE) , this island is known for its beautiful beaches, bays, and unique wildlife.[[1]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)

- **Getting there:** Ferries are available from [Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDhAC) and Perth City.
- **What to do:** Rent a bike to explore the island, take a bus tour, or try snorkeling, swimming, and fishing in the pristine waters.

One of the world's largest inner-city parks, [Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIBBAF) offers panoramic views of the Swan River and Perth's skyline.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

The Swan River is a centerpiece for recreation, with scenic cruises and walking paths along its banks.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

- **What to do:** Take a cruise, walk or cycle along the paths, or attend an event on the river.
- **Cultural Walking Tours:** Go Cultural Aboriginal Tours offers guided tours of Elizabeth Quay to learn about the area's rich history.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/christmas-dinner-cruise/4160/)[[2]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1963684017758)[[3]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[4]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

**[Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIChAC)**   
This interactive science museum features hands-on exhibits, a planetarium, and puppet shows, making it a great family-friendly option.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[2]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/warrior-world%3A-family-sundays/68538ca9a86647e01658c913)[[3]](https://www.expedia.co.in/SCITECH-Discovery-Centre-West-Perth.d6061189.Attraction#:~:text=A%20much-loved%20destination%20for%20families%20for%20over,exhibits%20on%20science%2C%20technology%2C%20engineering%20and%20mathematics.)[[4]](https://www.kayak.co.uk/news/family-holidays-in-australia/#:~:text=Perth%20also%20has%20a%20fantastic%20science%20museum%2C,around%20the%20Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Gardens.)[[5]](https://theabroadguide.com/scitech-discovery-centre-all-day-entry-ticket/#:~:text=Scitech%20Discovery%20Centre%20All%20Day%20Entry%20Ticket,Station%2C%20making%20access%20easy%20via%20public%20transport.)

- **What to do:** Experience the immersive planetarium or explore the various science exhibits. [Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQICxAC) also hosts adults-only "Planetarium Experience" events.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)

Coastal adventures

**[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDRAC)**   
A short ferry ride from [Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDRAE) , this island is known for its beautiful beaches, bays, and unique wildlife.[[1]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)

- **Getting there:** Ferries are available from [Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDhAC) and Perth City.
- **What to do:** Rent a bike to explore the island, take a bus tour, or try snorkeling, swimming, and fishing in the pristine waters.

This port city is located at the mouth of the Swan River and offers a vibrant mix of history, arts, and markets.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://events.tourism.australia.com/ate21/familiarisation-program#:~:text=Venture%20to%20the%20port%20city%20of%20Fremantle,get%20a%20selfie%20with%20the%20world-famous%20quokka.)[[3]](https://duniyasafari.com/destination/australia#:~:text=From%20Perth%20Rottnest%20Island:%20Famous%20for%20its,is%20perfect%20for%20a%20cultural%20day%20out.)

One of the world's largest inner-city parks, [Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIBBAF) offers panoramic views of the Swan River and Perth's skyline.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

**Swan River**   
The Swan River is a centerpiece for recreation, with scenic cruises and walking paths along its banks.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

- **What to do:** Take a cruise, walk or cycle along the paths, or attend an event on the river.
- **Cultural Walking Tours:** Go Cultural Aboriginal Tours offers guided tours of Elizabeth Quay to learn about the area's rich history.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/christmas-dinner-cruise/4160/)[[2]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1963684017758)[[3]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[4]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

**[Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIChAC)**   
This interactive science museum features hands-on exhibits, a planetarium, and puppet shows, making it a great family-friendly option.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[2]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/warrior-world%3A-family-sundays/68538ca9a86647e01658c913)[[3]](https://www.expedia.co.in/SCITECH-Discovery-Centre-West-Perth.d6061189.Attraction#:~:text=A%20much-loved%20destination%20for%20families%20for%20over,exhibits%20on%20science%2C%20technology%2C%20engineering%20and%20mathematics.)[[4]](https://www.kayak.co.uk/news/family-holidays-in-australia/#:~:text=Perth%20also%20has%20a%20fantastic%20science%20museum%2C,around%20the%20Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Gardens.)[[5]](https://theabroadguide.com/scitech-discovery-centre-all-day-entry-ticket/#:~:text=Scitech%20Discovery%20Centre%20All%20Day%20Entry%20Ticket,Station%2C%20making%20access%20easy%20via%20public%20transport.)

- **What to do:** Experience the immersive planetarium or explore the various science exhibits. [Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQICxAC) also hosts adults-only "Planetarium Experience" events.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)

Coastal adventures

**[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDRAC)**   
A short ferry ride from [Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDRAE) , this island is known for its beautiful beaches, bays, and unique wildlife.[[1]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)

- **Getting there:** Ferries are available from [Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDhAC) and Perth City.
- **What to do:** Rent a bike to explore the island, take a bus tour, or try snorkeling, swimming, and fishing in the pristine waters.
- **Quokkas:** Don't miss the chance to see the island's famous and adorable quokkas.[[1]](https://www.rottnestisland.com/visit/guides-tips/an-unforgettable-group-getaway-to-rottnest-island)[[2]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)

**[Fremantle](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/052_km_&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIDxAC)**   
This port city is located at the mouth of the Swan River and offers a vibrant mix of history, arts, and markets.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://events.tourism.australia.com/ate21/familiarisation-program#:~:text=Venture%20to%20the%20port%20city%20of%20Fremantle,get%20a%20selfie%20with%20the%20world-famous%20quokka.)[[3]](https://duniyasafari.com/destination/australia#:~:text=From%20Perth%20Rottnest%20Island:%20Famous%20for%20its,is%20perfect%20for%20a%20cultural%20day%20out.)

- **What to do:** Visit the [Fremantle Arts Centre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0d4yqf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIEBAC) to see exhibitions and markets, such as the "Bazaar Makers Market," featuring local artisans.
- **Festive fair:** Attend the FOMO Festive Fair, an open-air market with local goods and workshops.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://www.facebook.com/events/10-william-st-fremantle-wa-australia-western-australia-6160/fomo-festive-fair/1419132312509181/)

To enjoy Perth, `visit its inner-city parks, explore its coastal areas, and venture to nearby islands` . Notable activities include enjoying nature and views at [Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIAhAD) , discovering the port city of [Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIAhAF) , and seeing quokkas and beaches on [Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIAhAH).[[1]](https://www.rottnestisland.com/visit/guides-tips/an-unforgettable-group-getaway-to-rottnest-island)[[2]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)

One of the world's largest inner-city parks, [Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIBBAF) offers panoramic views of the Swan River and Perth's skyline.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

- **What to do:** Explore the Western Australian Botanic Garden , walk through the bushland, and visit the [State War Memorial](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1w604csr&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIBRAD).
- **Cost:** Free to enter.
- **Accessibility:** The park is wheelchair accessible, with ACROD parking available.[[1]](https://www.bgpa.wa.gov.au/kings-park#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20is%20both%20one,Kings%20Park%20Bushland)[[2]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)[[3]](https://www.visitperth.com/see-and-do/parks-gardens-and-reserves/Venues/kings-park#:~:text=In%20the%20very%20heart%20of,more%20in%20the%20video%20below%29.)[[4]](https://melbournecitycard.com/pricing/#:~:text=All%20you%20Need%20:%20All%20the%20listed,to%20Unlimited%20Attractions%20suitable%20for%20all%20ages!)

**Swan River**   
The Swan River is a centerpiece for recreation, with scenic cruises and walking paths along its banks.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

- **What to do:** Take a cruise, walk or cycle along the paths, or attend an event on the river.
- **Cultural Walking Tours:** Go Cultural Aboriginal Tours offers guided tours of Elizabeth Quay to learn about the area's rich history.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/christmas-dinner-cruise/4160/)[[2]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1963684017758)[[3]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[4]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

**[Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIChAC)**   
This interactive science museum features hands-on exhibits, a planetarium, and puppet shows, making it a great family-friendly option.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[2]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/warrior-world%3A-family-sundays/68538ca9a86647e01658c913)[[3]](https://www.expedia.co.in/SCITECH-Discovery-Centre-West-Perth.d6061189.Attraction#:~:text=A%20much-loved%20destination%20for%20families%20for%20over,exhibits%20on%20science%2C%20technology%2C%20engineering%20and%20mathematics.)[[4]](https://www.kayak.co.uk/news/family-holidays-in-australia/#:~:text=Perth%20also%20has%20a%20fantastic%20science%20museum%2C,around%20the%20Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Gardens.)[[5]](https://theabroadguide.com/scitech-discovery-centre-all-day-entry-ticket/#:~:text=Scitech%20Discovery%20Centre%20All%20Day%20Entry%20Ticket,Station%2C%20making%20access%20easy%20via%20public%20transport.)

- **What to do:** Experience the immersive planetarium or explore the various science exhibits. [Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQICxAC) also hosts adults-only "Planetarium Experience" events.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)

Coastal adventures

**[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDRAC)**   
A short ferry ride from [Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDRAE) , this island is known for its beautiful beaches, bays, and unique wildlife.[[1]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)

- **Getting there:** Ferries are available from [Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQ3egRegQIDhAC) and Perth City.
- **What to do:** Rent a bike to explore the island, take a bus tour, or try snorkeling, swimming, and fishing in the pristine waters.
- **Quokkas:** Don't miss the chance to see the island's famous and adorable quokkas.[[1]](https://www.rottnestisland.com/visit/guides-tips/an-unforgettable-group-getaway-to-rottnest-island)[[2]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)

**[Fremantle](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/052_km_&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIDxAC)**   
This port city is located at the mouth of the Swan River and offers a vibrant mix of history, arts, and markets.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://events.tourism.australia.com/ate21/familiarisation-program#:~:text=Venture%20to%20the%20port%20city%20of%20Fremantle,get%20a%20selfie%20with%20the%20world-famous%20quokka.)[[3]](https://duniyasafari.com/destination/australia#:~:text=From%20Perth%20Rottnest%20Island:%20Famous%20for%20its,is%20perfect%20for%20a%20cultural%20day%20out.)

- **What to do:** Visit the [Fremantle Arts Centre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0d4yqf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjO9r63nZORAxXkh1YBHc21MiIQqdYPegQIEBAC) to see exhibitions and markets, such as the "Bazaar Makers Market," featuring local artisans.
- **Festive fair:** Attend the FOMO Festive Fair, an open-air market with local goods and workshops.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://www.facebook.com/events/10-william-st-fremantle-wa-australia-western-australia-6160/fomo-festive-fair/1419132312509181/)

Markets and events

**Bayswater Twilight Market** 

- **When:** December 17, 2025.
- **Where:** Bert Wright Park.
- **What to do:** Enjoy food trucks, live music, and market stalls in a family-friendly atmosphere.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/bert-wright-park-king-william-street-bayswater-perth-wa-australia-western-austra/bayswater-twilight-market/1286412152937331/)

**Jazz Wednesdays with the Pete Jeavons Trio** 

- **When:** Wednesdays.
- **Where:** The Moon.
- **What to do:** Catch a free, weekly jazz performance. Reservations are recommended.[[1]](https://www.themoon.com.au/event-details/jazz-wednesdays-with-the-pete-jeavons-trio-2025-12-03-18-00)
